content: the sampler shawl is the product of sampling bases and pairing them together to see the resulting fabric this fabric may be meh or it may be a charming meet cute--you know that amazing first encounter with someone that just makes your heart sing in this case it s the latter in fact we loved the fabric of tod and mho mho together so much that we couldn t wait to wrap it around our neck and shoulders thus the sampler shawl was born the sampler shawl is a top-down triangle shawl worked in stockinette stitch with one strand of mho mho held together with one strand of tod quickly knit on size 10 needles the sampler is the perfect shawl to sample the yarn and its colors it s your go-to knit for when you just want to knit for the pleasure of knitting samples shown five color green sample shown in colors tod in colors martian c1 mantis c2 kitten c3 atomic c4 and hyperchick c5 with mho mho in color hyperchick five color pink sample shown in colors tod in colors florange c1 betty c2 atomic c3 pop rocks c4 and taffy c5 with mho mho in color taffy sizes one size finished measurements 27 5 /69 cm deep down center spine 79 /197 5 cm wingspan yarn requirements please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make the lamb & kid tod 65% yak 35% cashmere 150 yds per 50 gram skein 5 skeins two color version 3 skeins mc 2 skeins cc five color version 1 skein each of 5 colors suggested needles needles listed are suggested always take time to swatch gauge needle us size #10 6mm 32 circular needles or longer ribbing needle us size #9 5 5mm 40 circular needles tools 4 stitch markers tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 3 5 sts and 5 row = 1 /2 5 cm in st st worked flat using 1 strand of tod and 1 strand of mho mho held together *this pattern has been professionally tech edited *
